```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(gifski)
library(janitor)
library(gganimate)
library(readxl)
library(infer)

regime_polity <- read_excel("raw-data/polity_iv.xls") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, ccode, country, scode, polity) %>% 
  filter(year >= "1946") %>% 
  filter(polity != "-88") %>% 
  filter(polity != "-77") %>% 
  filter(polity != "-66")

regime_coup <- read_excel("raw-data/Coupdata.xls") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(year_of_event, cow_code, country_where_action_occurred, type_of_coup, 
         realized_coup, unrealized)

```

```{r turkey}

turkey_polity <- regime_polity %>% 
  filter(scode == "TUR") %>% 
  filter(year %in% (1959:1998))

ggplot(turkey_polity, aes(x = year, y = polity)) +
  geom_line()

turkey_coups <- regime_coup %>% 
  filter(cow_code == 640)




```
